extendedInfo.description: Invite the squirrel family to your home screen with this enchanting snowy forest scene. Snow falls gracefully over the squirrel home and in the distant woods beyond. The lamp and house lights flicker as the flames dance in the cool breeze.The amount of snow fall is customizable in the settings screen. You can also control the frame rate that the live background runs at.I created the snow fall in a few layers. The further the snow, the slower it appears to fall. This gives the scene a surprising amount of depth!Supports all screen sizes!Art by Amorphiss.

reviews.title: Crashes on Nexus 7; but great on LG Optimus Q
reviews.comment: Maybe a Jellybean problem as on my Nexus 7 it force closes when you try to Set Wallpaper.  No problem on the Optimus Q running Gingerbread.  Love all these though, probably my eight purchase from him.  :)
reviews.author: Jared Johnson

reviews.title: Samsung 3
reviews.comment: 2 functions only snowfall and. Frame rate, no rotation or picture scrolling needs work for this phone ,picture is good hope developer makes it wotk for samsung3
reviews.author: ralph vega

reviews.comment: I love this.. Glad there\'s a new one!!

reviews.title: Be sure!
reviews.comment: Be absolutely sure you want the full version before buying because you cannot refund..I have S3 and it doesnt work properly and picture doesnt scroll when I toggle through the screens..and the only custom settings with full version is amount of snow and frame rate.
reviews.author: Tina Jackson

reviews.title: Too cute.....
reviews.comment: Well done sir!  This is so sweet, I like it.....and they\'re squirrels! Luv those little critters, lol!  Thank u for this :)

reviews.title: Crashes instantly on my Nexus 7.
